# How To Convert An HTML File To PDF With WeasyPrint

This tutorial covers how to use WeasyPrint to convert an HTML file to a PDF.

## Steps

### Installing WeasyPrint On Debian 12

- In terminal type, "sudo apt-get install weasyprint".

### Convert HTML to PDF

- In terminal type, "weasyprint '/path/to/source.html' '/path/to/destination.pdf'

## Notes

- This tutorial only covers installation of WeasyPrint on Debian 12.
- This tutorial was tested on Debian 12 AMD64 XFCE.
